form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Schumer (for himself and Mr. Grassley) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for an extension of the Medicare-dependent hospital (MDH) program and the increased payments under the Medicare low-volume hospital program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Rural Hospital Access Act of 2013.

section.header: Extension of the Medicare-dependent hospital (MDH) program

subsection.text: Section 1886(d)(5)(G) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395ww(d)(5)(G)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in clause (i), by striking October 1, 2013 and inserting October 1, 2014; and
in clause (ii)(II), by striking October 1, 2013 and inserting October 1, 2014.
Section 1886(b)(3)(D) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395ww(b)(3)(D)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in the matter preceding clause (i), by striking October 1, 2013 and inserting October 1, 2014; and
in clause (iv), by striking through fiscal year 2013 and inserting through fiscal year 2014.

paragraph.text: Section 13501(e)(2) of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1993 (42 U.S.C. 1395ww note) is amended by striking through fiscal year 2013 and inserting through fiscal year 2014.

section.header: Extension of the increased payments under the Medicare low-volume hospital program
section.text: Section 1886(d)(12) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395ww(d)(12)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (C)(i), by striking and 2013 each place it appears and inserting , 2013, and 2014; and
in subparagraph (D), by striking and 2013 and inserting , 2013, and 2014.
